abstract: George Vecsey joined Jurgen Klinsmann and the United States national team on Monday during its visit to the September 11 Memorial in Manhattan.
snippet: George Vecsey joined Jurgen Klinsmann and the United States national team on Monday during its visit to the September 11 Memorial in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: George Vecsey of the Times assesses the first few months of the Jurgen Klinsmann era in a column that is on nytimes.com and will be in Tuesday's print editions. On Monday, he joined Klinsmann and the team on its visit to the September 11 Memorial in Manhattan.

headline.main: George Vecsey: Nice Touches to Start the Klinsmann Era
